title: Into the Wildbarrens
description: Gandalf. Dumbledore. Merlin. We all love the legendary wizards who mentored the heroes of our favorite tales. It’s time we add a new wizard to that list. This is his origin story. Join Falin and his honorable (and not-so-honorable) Champions on his journey for the Gems of Elsana. Dragons, monsters, and even the dreaded Wildbarrens can’t deter this motley bunch of adventurers as they embark on one of the greatest quests Elsana has ever known. Into the Wildbarrens is filled with comedy, action, romance, and thrills making it the perfect read for those seeking a feel-good fantasy!
author: Christian Sterling
